alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 2:51AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Webb County through 315 AM CDT... At 251 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Botines, or 15 miles north of Laredo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Botines, Ranchitos Las Lomas, Unitec Industrial Park and Callaghan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 14 and 30. US Highway 59 between mile markers 804 and 808. US Highway 83 between mile markers 688 and 698. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
